name: The Doc
description:
The Doc is a surreal horror game. One day, the Doc tasks you with defeating the monsters in the forest using a new gadget, the LoopWatch. But not all is as it seems…

Some tips:

e to interact with tv

go down the stairs

https://www.instagram.com/megalithiccat/
